title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S.J.Res. 57 into Law â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
May 21, 2018
On Monday, May 21, 2018, the President signed into law:S.J.Res. 57, which nullifies the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection bulletin regulating indirect auto lenders for compliance with the Equal Credit Opportunity Act.
